posts.postText: For as long as I have known, there have been maps where when you switch to them, after the first round is over and you spawn in for the second round, the server will crash. I do not know why this happens, I just know that after the server host was switched, it has started to happen on maps that previously it did not. This "bug" could keep us from adding new maps, and is probably one of the most obvious on the Jailbreak server.
We should do something so we can keep adding maps i dont want to be playing the same old same old
Do you know which maps crash it?

I seemed to have gotten this problem a while back, but it no longer occurs to me. For me, it was just when we changed maps, i would get some freaky error and my gmod would crash, but that seems to have been fixed?

I'll let you know if these crash for me as well.


Edit: I just checked, and have no problems with the maps.

>> I seemed to have gotten this problem a while back, but it no longer occurs to me. For me, it was just when we changed maps, i would get some freaky error and my gmod would crash, but that seems to have been fixed?

I'll let you know if these crash for me as well.


Edit: I just checked, and have no problems with the maps.â€‰

The issue was with our old host.
